channel.title: Omg read this
channel.description:
help someone please ive been working on this for hours
HOW DO I GET MY SERVER TO RUN ?!?!?!? plz help
ive done everything now this guide im reading says...
Compiling After every update in the .java files you have to compile it. Compiling will make .class files off them and your server runs on them. For just an easy compiler make a new text file with notepad. Add this to it: Code:
@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Click Save as... And change file type to 'All Files' and name it compile.bat Now when running the compile.bat you will compile your server.
Running the server To run the server you just run 'Run.bat' or however it is called in your source. I can't give you an code for it because some sources have different folders to save the class files in. Make sure your No-IP is running!
WHAT DO I DO !?!?!?!?! lol help thnx

item.title: Omg read this
item.dc:creator: @AX7ATREYU21 AX7ATREYU21
item.description:
@AX7ATREYU21 wrote:

help someone please ive been working on this for hours

HOW DO I GET MY SERVER TO RUN ?!?!?!? plz help

ive done everything now this guide im reading says…

Compiling
After every update in the .java files you have to compile it.
Compiling will make .class files off them and your server runs on them.
For just an easy compiler make a new text file with notepad.
Add this to it:
Code:

@echo off
title Server Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Click Save as…
And change file type to ‘All Files’ and name it compile.bat
Now when running the compile.bat you will compile your server.

Running the server
To run the server you just run ‘Run.bat’ or however it is called in your source.
I can’t give you an code for it because some sources have different folders to save the class files in.
Make sure your No-IP is running!

WHAT DO I DO !?!?!?!?! lol help thnx

Read full topic
